      • parseString

        public static java.lang.String[] parseString(java.lang.String s,
                             boolean base64)
        Split a string into words. Needed to parse the commands from the PHP backend and the main config file.
        Parameters:
        s - String to split into words.
        base64 - The words are base64-encoded?
        Returns:
        An array of words.

      • parseString

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An array of words.

      • parseFile

        public static java.lang.String[] parseFile(java.lang.String fn)
        Split a file into words. Needed to read the main config file.
        Parameters:
        fn - Path and name of the file to read
        Returns:
        An array of words on success, null on failure.

      • makeUID

        public static java.lang.String makeUID()
        Create an UID. Needed to keep track of the JDBC ResultSets with the PHP backend.
        Returns:
        The generated UID.

      • safeFn

        public static java.lang.String safeFn(java.lang.String fn)
        Make a filename safe.
        Parameters:
        fn - Unsafe file name
        Returns:
        Safe file name
